title: Loss Forgiven, 8 LP Victory?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Was in a ranked game when Riot enabled Loss Forgiven while they investigate a player connection issue. We won the match and I only received 8 LP for the victory. Is this related to Loss Forgiven being activated or is my MMR just that OUTRAGEOUSLY bad?


{{champion:44}}  xoxo
